text: Sven Gösta Ågren (August 3, 1936 – June 24, 2020) was a Finnish author. He won the Finlandia Prize in 1988 for Jär.Bredsdorff, Elias (1990). Scandinavica, vols. 29–30. Academic Press."Literary Awards of the Nordic Countries: Finland – The Finlandia Prize ", ScandinavianBooks.com, retrieved 20 January 2010 Ågren wrote his works in Swedish.Poetics For The Gospels? Rethinking Narrative Criticism by Petri Merenlahti, p. 36. He was known for his left-wing views.History of Finnish Literature by Jaakko Ahokas, p. 433. Ågren died on June 24, 2020, aged 83.Gösta Ågren är död. Hufvudstadsbladet. ==Works== * ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Finnish poets
title: Gösta Ågren
